item.description:
On December 7th Friday at 7:30 p.m we will view the movie Amazing Grace. This movie is based on the inspiring true life story of British antislavery pioneer William Wilberforce and is directed by Michael Apted. For more info on the movie, check the website www.amazinggracemovie.com.
From what i've heard, this is inspiring and the soundtrack is great.

Hope you can come to enjoy this inspiring movie with us,
Christine
item.name: Conscious Movie Meetup! December Meetup
